text:
"Hei kau mencurigakan ku? Cepatlah minum teh mu, aku tidak memberikan apapun didalam sana kecuali gula dan serbuk teh. Jadi itu aman" kata Jisung lagi
Chenle yang sedikit masih ragu pun meminum teh buatan Jisung, ya memang rasanya seperti teh hangat pada umumnya. Chenle baru tau kalau Jisung bisa juga membuat teh
"Darimana kau belajar cara membuat teh?" tanya Chenle lagi
"Jangan banyak bertanya, cepat habiskan lalu kau kembali istirahat. Jangan membatah, kalau membantah akan ku hajar lagi kau seperti semalam" ancam Jisung
Chenle yang mendengar pun tidak bersuara lagi, ia kini mulai menghabiskan teh buatan Jisung dengan perlahan
"Sudah" ujar Chenle yang kini teh itu sudah habis dan memberikan gelas kosong itu ke Jisung
trans:
"Hey, are you suspicious of me? Hurry up and drink your tea, I didn't put anything in there except sugar and tea powder. So, it's safe," said Jisung again.
Chenle, who was still a little doubtful, drank the tea prepared by Jisung, yes it really tasted like warm tea in general. Chenle just found out that Jisung can also make tea
"Where did you learn how to make tea?" Chenle asked again.
"Don't ask too many questions, finish it quickly and then go back to rest. Don't argue, if you argue I'll beat you up again like last night," threatened Jisung.
Chenle, who heard it, didn't say anything anymore, she now started to finish Jisung's tea slowly
"Done," said Chenle, who had finished her tea and handed the empty glass to Jisung.
